quote: Understanding requires insight. Insight must be anchored.
author: Brian Greene,  The Fabric of the Cosmos

quote: Learning is not the accumulation of knowledge, but rather, one thing only: understanding
author: Donna Jo Napoli

quote: Understanding is a three edged sword: your side, their side, and the truth.
author: J. Michael Straczynski

quote: Understanding is the reward of faith. Therefore, seek not to understand that you may believe, but believe that you may understand.
author: Augustine of Hippo

quote: Everything can be explained to the people, on the single condition that you want them to understand.
author: Frantz Fanon,  The Wretched of the Earth

quote: We understand more than we know.
author: Margaret Atwood,  Oryx and Crake

quote: While we can learn or study techniques for almost anything we might want to accomplish, real understanding is not the mere accumulation of knowledge. Understanding cannot be realized by listening or reading about the realization of others. It must be achieved firsthand via substantive, direct perception in the moment.
author: H.E. Davey,  Japanese Yoga: The Way of Dynamic Meditation

quote: Depth of understanding involves something which is more than merely a matter of deconstructive alertness; it involves a measure of interpretative charity and at least the beginnings of a wide responsiveness.
author: Stefan Collini

quote: Whenever we proceed from the known into the unknown we may hope to understand, but we may have to learn at the same time a new meaning of the word 'understanding.
author: Werner Heisenberg,  Physics and Philosophy: The Revolution in Modern Science

quote: When you realize there is something you don't understand, then you're generally on the right path to understanding all kinds of things.
author: Jostein Gaarder,  The Solitaire Mystery

quote: Understanding is the first step to acceptance, and only with acceptance can there be recovery.
author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: Guarding knowledge is not a good way to understand. Understanding means to throw away your knowledge.
author: Hanh Nhat Thich,  Being Peace

quote: I write to understand as much as to be understood.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: Narrative understanding is a large part of the ability to connect with, understand, and have compassion for all of us engaged in learning more about being human.
author: Leah C. Fowler

quote: To understand life is to understand ourselves, and that is both the beginning and the end of education.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti,  Education and the Significance of Life

quote: I do not know everything; still many things I understand.
author: Madeleine L'Engle,  A Wrinkle in Time

quote: I don't understand a thing about this world: about people, and why they do the things they do. The more I find out, the more I uncover, the more I know, the less I understand.
author: Craig Silvey,  Jasper Jones

quote: Any fool can know. The point is to understand.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: All, everything that I understand, I understand only because I love.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Knowledge is not made for understanding; it is made for cutting.
author: Michel Foucault

quote: You can't understand where someone's going unless you understand where they've been.
author: Jerry B. Jenkins

quote: Just because you don't understand it doesn't mean it isn't so.
author: Lemony Snicket,  The Blank Book

quote: Keenly seek knowledge.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Life is a succesion of lessons which must be lived to be understood.
author: Helen Keller

quote: The true understanding of life and its purposes comes from an understanding of consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: If you can't explain it to a six year old, you don't understand it yourself.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The highest activity a human being can attain is learning for understanding, because to understand is to be free.
author: Baruch Spinoza

quote: By thinking of things you could understand them.
author: James Joyce,  A Portrait of the Artist as a Young Man

quote: Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Science is the process that takes us from confusion to understanding...
author: Brian Greene

quote: All of us must cross the line between ignorance and insight many times before we truly understand.
author: David Hawkins

quote: All I know is I make sense to me- it's other people who seem complicated.
author: Tara Kelly,  Harmonic Feedback

quote: A process cannot be understood by stopping it. Understanding must move with the flow of the process, must join it and flow with it.
author: Frank Herbert

quote: Love involves a peculiar unfathomable combination of understanding and misunderstanding.
author: Diane Arbus

quote: Knowing it and seeing it are two different things.
author: Suzanne Collins,  Mockingjay

quote: one does not only wish to be understood when one writes; one wishes just as surely not to be understood.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Logic: The art of thinking and reasoning in strict accordance with the limitations and incapacities of the human misunderstanding.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: You never really understand a person until you consider things from his point of view... Until you climb inside of his skin and walk around in it.
author: Harper Lee,  To Kill a Mockingbird

quote: If you win, you need not have to explain...If you lose, you should not be there to explain!
author: Adolf Hitler

quote: You live it forward, but understand it backward.
author: Abraham Verghese,  Cutting for Stone

quote: There's nothing wrong with not understanding yourself.
author: Jonathan Safran Foer,  Extremely Loud and Incredibly Close

quote: Great understanding is broad and unhurried; little understanding is cramped and busy. Great words are clear and limpid; little words are shrill and quarrelsome.
author: Chuang Chou

quote: Human science fragments everything in order to understand it, kills everything in order to examine it.
author: Leo Tolstoy,  War and Peace

quote: Interpretations of interpretations interpreted.
author: James Joyce

quote: Learning is an ornament in prosperity, a refuge in adversity, and a provision in old age.
author: Aristotle

quote: Can you understand? Someone, somewhere, can you understand me a little, love me a little? For all my despair, for all my ideals, for all that - I love life. But it is hard, and I have so much - so very much to learn.
author: Sylvia Plath,  The Journals of Sylvia Plath

quote: To acquire knowledge, one must study;but to acquire wisdom, one must observe.
author: Marilyn Vos Savant

quote: Your pain is the breaking of the shell that encloses your understanding.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: Don't waste your time with explanations: people only hear what they want to hear.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Perhaps it would be simpler if you just did what you're told and didn't try to understand things.
author: Terry Pratchett,  Sourcery
